rajola.pipeline.level

Class TileMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajola.pipeline.level.TileMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public class TileMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
    Author:
    Frederic-Antoine Gingras The TileMap class holds a collection of all the tiles on the map and their positions, ids, attributes It's has multiple functions to ease map creation programaticly.
